name: Mombacho - Favilli Lava - Small Cigar
additionalNotes: Mombacho cigars was founded in 2006 by Cameron Heaps, a Canadian businessman and world traveler who fell in love with the City of Granada in Nicaragua, its people, culture, cigars, and Mombacho, the volcano that overlooks this historical city. In 2011, to help him with his new venture, Heaps enlisted Claudio Sgroi, an Italian educator turned master blender under the mentorship of Hendrik “Henke” Kelner, Davidoff’s chief cigarmaker. Mombacho cigars are handmade in Nicaragua using traditional rolling methods. They are noted for their superb construction, rich aroma, and complexity of flavors.
